title: Add the Assets
definition: If the assets you wish to work with are not listed under ->Exchange Assets->, you must add and configure them first.
callOut: In this section of the tutorial, you will learn to define which assets you may want to work with.
tip: Each exchange may list hundreds of assets, however, you will likely be interested in just a few. Some automated operations may feed on your definitions, so keeping them free of junk is always a good idea.
